column2: Intel shares could rise 25 pct in next year - Barron's NEW YORK
column3: April 17 Intel Corp's      shift to higher-growth businesses such as server chips and embedded chips for cars could drive a 25 increase in its shares in a year
column4: according to a report on Sunday in the financial publication Barron's.
